segment.source: Activating and Closing Windows in ACM (Windows 10)
segment.target: Activating and Closing Windows in ACM (Windows 10)

segment.source: The Windows dialog box shows the windows that are open in Application Compatibility Manager (ACM).
segment.target: The Windows dialog box shows the windows that are open in Application Compatibility Manager (ACM).

segment.source: Activating and Closing Windows in ACM
segment.target: Activating and Closing Windows in ACM

segment.target: Applies to

segment.target: Windows 10

segment.target: Windows 7

segment.source: Windows Server 2012
segment.target: Windows Server 2012

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2

segment.source: The Windows dialog box shows the windows that are open in Application Compatibility Manager (ACM).
segment.target: The Windows dialog box shows the windows that are open in Application Compatibility Manager (ACM).

segment.source: To view a list of the open windows in ACM
segment.target: To view a list of the open windows in ACM

segment.source: On the Window menu, click Windows.
segment.target: On the Window menu, click Windows.

segment.source: To show an open window in ACM
segment.target: To show an open window in ACM

segment.source: In the Windows dialog box, click the window name from the list of open windows, and then click Activate.
segment.target: In the Windows dialog box, click the window name from the list of open windows, and then click Activate.

segment.source: The selected window appears on top of any others on your screen.
segment.target: The selected window appears on top of any others on your screen.

segment.source: To close one or more windows in ACM
segment.target: To close one or more windows in ACM

segment.source: In the Windows dialog box, click one or more window names from the list of open windows, and then click Close Window(s).
segment.target: In the Windows dialog box, click one or more window names from the list of open windows, and then click Close Window(s).
